Other Information.Test Conditions: 27–207 K, gas flow conditions with neon carrier gas
Other Information.Additional Info: H2 diffuses faster than D2 above 64 K due to lower molecular weight; quantum effects reverse selectivity below 64 K.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 27–207 K, gas flow conditions with neon carrier gas
Other Information.Additional Info: D2 diffuses faster than H2 below 64 K due to quantum effects and lower zero-point energy.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale with quantum effects influencing diffusion rates

Experimental Validation.Method: On-chip surface acoustic wave (SAW) sensor measurements and molecular dynamics simulations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Maximum D2/H2 selectivity of 1.35 at 27.5 K; crossover temperature at 64 K

Other Information.Additional Info: MFU-4 exhibits flexibility in narrow pores, enabling uptake of both H2 and D2 despite ultra-narrow pore apertures of 2.5 Å.
